document_data.name: Milshoun's Stronghouses
document_data.mainbody: '''Milshoun's Stronghouses''' was a collection of three stone warehouses in [[Beliard]] around [[1368 DR]].
document_data.Inhabitants: The warehouses were owned by [[Ahbhaer Mhilshoun]], who provided storage facilities per day, tenday, or month. Milshoun's Stronghouses were protected by a dozen guards, who hunted game in the hills to the north during their spare time.
document_data.Prices:
* Storage space per chest for 20 [[gp]] a night
* Storage space per tenday was 50 gp
* Storage per month was 125 gp.
